verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> the plague <S%H4046><s%>, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, throughout their fathers' <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, all that are able to go <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> with them in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take the sum of the people, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, the eldest <S%H1060><s%> son of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>; Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, of whom cometh the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hanochites <S%H2599><s%>: of Pallu <S%H6396><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Palluites <S%H6384><s%>:
Of Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hezronites <S%H2697><s%>: of Carmi <S%H3756><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Carmites <S%H3757><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>: and they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were forty <S%H705><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pallu <S%H6396><s%>; Eliab <S%H446><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>; Nemuel <S%H5241><s%>, and Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>. This is that Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, which were famous <S%H7148><s%> <S%H7121><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, who strove <S%H5327><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the company <S%H5712><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, when they strove <S%H5327><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>:

And the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%> together with Korah <S%H7141><s%>, when that company <S%H5712><s%> died <S%H4194><s%>, what time the fire <S%H784><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%>: and they became a sign <S%H5251><s%>.
Notwithstanding the children <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> not.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Nemuel <S%H5241><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Nemuelites <S%H5242><s%>: of Jamin <S%H3226><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jaminites <S%H3228><s%>: of Jachin <S%H3199><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jachinites <S%H3200><s%>:
Of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%>: of Shaul <S%H7586><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shaulites <S%H7587><s%>.
These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Simeonites <S%H8099><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Zephon <S%H6827><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zephonites <S%H6831><s%>: of Haggi <S%H2291><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Haggites <S%H2291><s%>: of Shuni <S%H7764><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shunites <S%H7765><s%>:
Of Ozni <S%H244><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Oznites <S%H244><s%>: of Eri <S%H6179><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Erites <S%H6180><s%>:
Of Arod <S%H720><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Arodites <S%H722><s%>: of Areli <S%H692><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Arelites <S%H692><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%>: and Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%> were; of Shelah <S%H7956><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shelanites <S%H8024><s%>: of Pharez <S%H6557><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Pharzites <S%H6558><s%>: of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pharez <S%H6557><s%> were; of Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hezronites <S%H2697><s%>: of Hamul <S%H2538><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hamulites <S%H2539><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, threescore and sixteen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Tola <S%H8439><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Tolaites <S%H8440><s%>: of Pua <S%H6312><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Punites <S%H6324><s%>:
Of Jashub <S%H3437><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jashubites <S%H3432><s%>: of Shimron <S%H8110><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shimronites <S%H8117><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, threescore <S%H8346><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Sered <S%H5624><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Sardites <S%H5625><s%>: of Elon <S%H356><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Elonites <S%H440><s%>: of Jahleel <S%H3177><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jahleelites <S%H3178><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Zebulunites <S%H2075><s%> according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, threescore <S%H8346><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%> were Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Machirites <S%H4354><s%>: and Machir <S%H4353><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%>: of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> come the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gileadites <S%H1569><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>: of Jeezer <S%H372><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jeezerites <S%H373><s%>: of Helek <S%H2507><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Helekites <S%H2516><s%>:
And of Asriel <S%H844><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Asrielites <S%H845><s%>: and of Shechem <S%H7928><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shechemites <S%H7930><s%>:
And of Shemida <S%H8061><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shemidaites <S%H8062><s%>: and of Hepher <S%H2660><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hepherites <S%H2662><s%>.

And Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%> had no sons <S%H1121><s%>, but daughters <S%H1323><s%>: and the names <S%H8034><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> were Mahlah <S%H4244><s%>, and Noah <S%H5270><s%>, Hoglah <S%H2295><s%>, Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, and Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, fifty <S%H2572><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuthalhites <S%H8364><s%>: of Becher <S%H1071><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Bachrites <S%H1076><s%>: of Tahan <S%H8465><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Tahanites <S%H8470><s%>.
And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%>: of Eran <S%H6197><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Eranites <S%H6198><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>. These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Bela <S%H1106><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Belaites <S%H1108><s%>: of Ashbel <S%H788><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ashbelites <S%H789><s%>: of Ahiram <S%H297><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ahiramites <S%H298><s%>:
Of Shupham <S%H8197><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuphamites <S%H7781><s%>: of Hupham <S%H2349><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Huphamites <S%H2350><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> were Ard <S%H714><s%> and Naaman <S%H5283><s%>: of Ard, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ardites <S%H716><s%>: and of Naaman <S%H5283><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Naamites <S%H5280><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: and they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Shuham <S%H7748><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuhamites <S%H7749><s%>. These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>.

All the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuhamites <S%H7749><s%>, according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Jimna <S%H3232><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jimnites <S%H3232><s%>: of Jesui <S%H3440><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jesuites <S%H3441><s%>: of Beriah <S%H1283><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Beriites <S%H1284><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah <S%H1283><s%>: of Heber <S%H2268><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Heberites <S%H2277><s%>: of Malchiel <S%H4439><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Malchielites <S%H4440><s%>.
And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> was Sarah <S%H8294><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them; who were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Jahzeel <S%H3183><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jahzeelites <S%H3184><s%>: of Guni <S%H1476><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gunites <S%H1477><s%>:
Of Jezer <S%H3337><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jezerites <S%H3340><s%>: of Shillem <S%H8006><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shillemites <S%H8016><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>: and they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These were the numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and a thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Unto these the land <S%H776><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names <S%H8034><s%>.

To many <S%H7227><s%> thou shalt give the more <S%H7235><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and to few <S%H4592><s%> thou shalt give the less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: to every one <S%H376><s%> shall his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of him. give the more: Heb. multiply his inheritance give the less: Heb. diminish his inheritance

Notwithstanding the land <S%H776><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%>: according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> they shall inherit <S%H5157><s%>.
According <S%H6310><s%> to the lot <S%H1486><s%> shall the possession <S%H5159><s%> thereof be divided <S%H2505><s%> between many <S%H7227><s%> and few <S%H4592><s%>.

And these are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>: of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%>: of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>: of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Merarites <S%H4848><s%>.

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Libnites <S%H3846><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hebronites <S%H2276><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mahlites <S%H4250><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mushites <S%H4188><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Korathites <S%H7145><s%>. And Kohath <S%H6955><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Amram <S%H6019><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of Amram's <S%H6019><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> was Jochebed <S%H3115><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, whom her mother bare <S%H3205><s%> to Levi <S%H3878><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and she bare <S%H3205><s%> unto Amram <S%H6019><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and Miriam <S%H4813><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>.
And unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> Nadab <S%H5070><s%>, and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.
And Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, when they offered <S%H7126><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, all males <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>: for they were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because there was no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> them among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, who numbered <S%H6485><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

But among these there was not a man <S%H376><s%> of them whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%>, when they numbered <S%H6485><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> of them, They shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>. And there was not left <S%H3498><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them, save Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.
